Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; two added white bands above a single added red band; below, near bottom of sherd, two more white bands and single red band; exterior: at top, trace of handle frill and to its right guilloche pattern in handle zone; below five brown bands; ancient repair hole near top left corner.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0801) (phase 2)
